name: HeLa USD
description: HeLa USD, also called HLUSD is the synthetic dollar of the HeLa Chain, plays a crucial role in facilitating seamless and efficient transactions within the ecosystem. HLUSD, an asset-backed stable synthetic dollar on HeLa Chain, offers a multitude of benefits that make it an indispensable asset within the ecosystem. Being asset-backed, HLUSD enjoys stability and predictability, ensuring a 1-1 redemption for 1 USDT/USDC.
